name: Magma 53 : Poetry and Music
description:
Magma is distinct from other poetry magazines because each issue has a different editor. The editorship circulates among the group that runs the magazine, with an occasional guest editor. Each editor brings with his or her particular interests to bear, resulting in poems and emphases that no-one else in the group could have predicted.

I am the designer of Issue 53, guest edited by Rob Mackenzie and Kona Macphee, on the theme of poetry and music.

http://magmapoetry.com/buy-magma/payment

name: Unit 12 Summer Show Catalogue 2012
description:
A catalogue of works produced by Diploma Unit 12 for the Bartlett Summer Show at UCL during June 2012.

127mm x 203mm 
Perfect bound in 350gsm non-scuff finished board. 
82 pages of full colour images and text on 100gsm coated paper. 
First Edition of 300 AVALIABLE

name: The Aylesbury Town Hall: Perspective study of canteen and entrance to records department
description:
A B2 print of an image from The Aylesbury Town Hall project, 2011. The original was a 1.3m x 0.8m pastel drawing which has been photographed on a medium format camera and printed fastidiously to reproduce the vibrant colour of the original. The image has been published in the Architectural Review, and the original has been shown in the Royal Academy of Art Summer Exhibition 2012, London.

500mm x 700mm
Brilliant Museum Satin Matte White 300GSM
Printed on HP Designjet Z-Series
